name: MouseCan
description:
Warning! X - Jump.  So remember that) Sorry :< 

This game is not very hard, you can notice that some buttons are not working and score is useless.

"MouseCan" has 5 levels and menu, 2 animations(idle animation, run animation), 5 easy levels and 1 level with small secret. The game is very raw and simple, so it won't take much time to pass the "MouseCan". 

Please write about bugs and I'll try to fix them, enjoy)
